result.markdown: --- title: "Week 10: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Seasonal ARIMA models * Computing forecasts for ARIMA models * ARIMA vs ETS models ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.9-9.10 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 11-16 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides ## Assignments * [Assignment 3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Tuesday 20 May. * [Retail Project](../assignments/Project.qmd) is due on Friday 30 May. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 10 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868375) is due on Sunday 18 May.
